thread.title: Anthony Schiano
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by Anthony Schiano

author: Anthony Schiano
title: Anthony Schiano
text: I was very pleased with my interaction with Brushy Mointain. I am in the process of becoming a beekeeper, and their catalogue was quite extensive and easy to navigate. I also made a mistake in my order, which could be spotted only by someone who knew the process. They called me to double check and straighten it out.i was very satisfied.
